question:
How many underage patients were examined during the course of the three-year period from 1990 to 1993?
underage patients refers to year(Birthday) < 18; three-year period from 1990 to 1993 refers to year(`Examination Date`) between '1990' and '1993'
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.ID) FROM Patient AS T1 INNER JOIN Examination AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM T2."Examination Date") BETWEEN 1990 AND 1993 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM T2."Examination Date") - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM T1.Birthday) < 18
